nodes.text: Voklov Adaim was a male Anomid who worked as a bioweapons designer during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Around 3643 BBY, Adaim was arrested and executed for crimes against the Anomid species; before he was executed, an agent of the Empire visited him and convinced him to share his knowledge. Despite his dislike of the Empire, Adaim agreed to share his research and materials.
Voklov Adaim was first mentioned in the Bioanalysis crewskill mission "Exit Interview," which is only available to Imperial classes in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
